verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 58] [V: killed] [ARGM-TMP: when speeding train plows through crowd at religious festival in india] a speeding train ran over a crowd watching fireworks during a religious festival in northern india on friday killing at least 58 people and injuring dozens more police said dussehra los angeles times festival india train shatrughan das press trust of india
